one_reviews_text:
PLEASE make more space games with this 80s style!

i love it
A decent 6dof upgrade to many 3dof kinda dealies I played on GO and such.

review_title: ive been playing for a while
one_reviews_text:
turning this idea over and over in my head. what if this was a full fledged cinematic game with other aspects exploring ruined space stations, mining for fuel and resources to make weapons and ship upgrades, owning a station that you can operate quests out of in an open world environment and so much more. devs, please get back to me about this. im willing to work on a passion project with you. i see an already beautiful game in the making

edit: Simon, would you consider selling your ip or source code to someone in facebook gaming that wold be intersted in making this more? this idea is like a dormant species of videogame just waiting to be discovered. could be bigger than eve online. by the way i still play this game and despite the lack of content theres huge replay value, i love this so much
review_feedback:
Thanks a lot MassacreXmas,

The game definitely can use more content, but I fear this was a one-time thing. I might start a project in a few years, but as it is right now the development of this game has ended. 

Best, Simon
